name: TicketHurry
overview: TicketHurry is a convenient online shop for readily available, and hard to find tickets; using many different networks to acquire them. Tickets sold through TicketHurryâ€™s sources may be sold for less or more than their face value, depending on demand. TicketHurry uses several different means to secure premium and previously sold-out ticket inventories, (often in large quantities), for events such as concerts or sporting events. TicketHurry operate within a vast network of ticket contacts, including record labels, season ticket holders, Fan Clubs, individual ticket resellers, and ticket brokers.
